subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Carlos Zambrano’s dugout altercation with Derrek Lee, his Cubs teammate, resulted in an indefinite suspension. The Cubs lost the game to the White Sox, 6-0.
snippet: Carlos Zambrano’s dugout altercation with Derrek Lee, his Cubs teammate, resulted in an indefinite suspension. The Cubs lost the game to the White Sox, 6-0.
